scripts.build:bridge: bash -c 'TRIPLE=$(scripts/detect-triple.sh) && PKG_T=$(scripts/pkg-target.sh $TRIPLE) && cd bridge && npm install && mkdir -p ../src-tauri/binaries && npx pkg index.js --targets $PKG_T --output ../src-tauri/binaries/nare-bridge-$TRIPLE && chmod +x ../src-tauri/binaries/nare-bridge-$TRIPLE'
